main.name: Mike Lazko
main.description: I am a software engineer and I use python/C# and react to develop great products
main.bio: I possess very good knowledge of software development methodology and principles. A fan of DDD. Have experience of working in medium distributed teams. I try to be self-critical and demanding of myself. I like reading technical literature.
